Name: Tommi's Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
7.5 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: A delicately bittersweet aperitif cocktail that heroes mezcal complexity.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2014 at Wahaca's Mezcalería Cocktail Bar, London, England. This cocktail is named after the fabulous Thomasina "Tommi" Miers OBE, who co-founded the Wahaca chain of Mexican street food restaurants.
Nutrition: One serving of Tommi's Cocktail contains 189 calories
